panel.name: پنل مدیریت مرکز تماس مهنا
panel.naichlog: *17* add style (border) to excel outputs *16* grid fixed pager *15* add category for dataservers *14* fix naigrid pager element add naigrid to system.xml show module version in menu *13* add second to grid_format method zdate add subgrid support to naiGrid fix excel export in naiGrid developer_mode is boolean in url. load config.php?developer_mode=true add naiJax plugin for ajax calls add spiner to images loading spinner (fix login problem) add digital font add removeBoms file to fix bom files if needed *12* responsive better reload cache better style naigrid option for disable pager in naigrid fix cache problem in inaccess option for modules persian text for wrong un or pw add jquery repeatable_item add jquery naicountdown add isElemInView, secToTime, naiPercentage function into nai_func.js add reloadcache for all users add jquery persiandatepickernai send input name 'shiftwork' when user logged in *11* fix bugs in ver 10! (set developer mode off -config.php- and fix free jdate called in nai_require by pass parameter *10* lis nailic __cache class added (by Nainemom). baraye sorat be function haye tulani session max life time to 30min new naigrid plugin developer mode by one click on the footer when scroll at end of page top menu's style updated. theme updated upload tgz file for new modules directly from panel! delete module folder from panel directly (pro, click on icon of module)! referer problem solved (when manualy typing address) dynamic no notification info text added remove title h2, bcoz its clear that which module was loaded results of search in sidebar has orginall class applyed to default li *9* function nai_get_browser added to nai_get_browser. if browser is not chrome40+, show warning (in config.php). nai_new_file function renamed to nai_write_file. nai_log function updated. function nai_can_access_to_this_option added *8* phpexcel cache option added (function.inc.php) functione nai_file_download update shod (hanuz ba halate ghabli kar mikone) functions nai_excel_header, nai_excel_row, nai_excel_footer be nai_myclass.php functione nai_content_download ezafe shod function get_mac_linux o ina added zdate updated (sec to elapced time) node service check notification updated new theme 'flat' appended low-level lisance checking some little bug fixed *7* isModuleInstalled function to global nodejs nai-asterisk-manager updated tuye menu neshun mide ke dar hale tose'e hastesh ya na. (unaee ke naivereshun ing dare dar hale tose'e hastan) page e module ha update shod panel o versionesh tu safeye module ha ezafe shod footer, header codes cleaned logout shodane khodkar update shod be 2 saate va fix shod. get[do] ke servero khamush mikardo ina, codash raft tu core function nodejs warning in header notification *6* ezafe shodane vis be library haye javascript va functione include_plugin php size e textbox tu chrome rafe moshkele heighte sub category ha tu sidebar, module haye beta texteshun avaz shodan 2015-05-09 node js hamashun raftan ru ye porto ina o foldere node ezafe shod tooltip master, data-direction ham migire, age nadadi, chap mizare . 2015-05-04 javascript haye man, func ha ba unayi ke chizi set mioknan joda shodan. 2015-04-26 *5* ba javascript check mikonam ke safhe hatman dorost load shode bashe! age nashode bud, reload beshe. yani dige moshkele nesfe load shodan nadare. ghabeliat disable budane item haye header ham ezafe shod. 2015-04-19 *4* nodejs moduleha az panele asli joda shodo khode nodejs, ba khode panel nasb mishe. title e reloading ham farsi shod. 2015-04-14 *3* file-e htaccess tuye foldere modules ezafe shod. chon dasresi mahdud bud unja *2* meghdare naiver be safeye moduleha ezafe shod, tuye mainstyle ham ye taghirate kuchik dade shod.
